---
title: Exploring Addresses and Parcels
---

```{python}
import duckdb
import pandas as pd

con = duckdb.connect()
con.execute("INSTALL spatial; LOAD spatial;")

pd.set_option("display.max_rows", None)

# Load parcels (polygon geometries)
con.execute("""
    CREATE TABLE parcels_and_addresses AS
    SELECT * FROM ST_Read('../data/fan_addresses_with_parcels.csv');
""")


df = con.execute("""
select * from parcels_and_addresses limit 0
""").df()
df.columns
```

```{python}
df = con.execute("""
create table parcels as
select 
ParcelID,
OwnerName,
AsrLocationBldgNo,
MailAddress,
MailCity,
MailState,
MailZip,
AssessmentDate,
LandValue,
DwellingValue,
TotalValue,
LandSqFt,
ProvalAsmtNhood,
TaxExemptCode,
PropertyClassID,
PropertyClass,
LandUse,
Mailable_1,
MaskedOwner
from parcels_and_addresses
group by
ParcelID,
OwnerName,
AsrLocationBldgNo,
MailAddress,
MailCity,
MailState,
MailZip,
AssessmentDate,
LandValue,
DwellingValue,
TotalValue,
LandSqFt,
ProvalAsmtNhood,
TaxExemptCode,
PropertyClassID,
PropertyClass,
LandUse,
Mailable_1,
MaskedOwner
""").df()
```

```{python}
df = con.execute("""
select LandUse, count(*) from parcels 
group by landuse
order by 2 desc
""").df()
df
```
